snippet.title: Neon Inferno - Official Developer Commentary Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Join the developer for a deep dive and look at action-packed gameplay from the first level of Neon Inferno in this video for the upcoming game that fuses side-scroller and gallery-shooter game. Neon Inferno will be available on PC. NYC 2055: a city beyond salvation. Blast your way through this dense cyberpunk jungle in Neon Inferno, an explosive fusion of 2D run-and-gun and gallery-shooter, and help the Family dominate its streets!
